name: Game on Coronavirus
description:
Hi, guys, I have created a game on coronavirus. I am new to coding have learned Python very recently and created this using pygame.  I would love it if you can play it and give your suggestions. You will definitely like the game and the music is definitely a must listen to. 

Its a simple and a very interesting game in which you have to kill virus before it enters the stage 4 through the help of a hand sanitizer.
